snippet: The United Nations hopes to negotiate a cease-fire around the northern city and restart a process “with a clear political horizon.” But diplomats see little sign of a breakthrough.
abstract: United Nations is resuming talks with Syria to find a way to broker cease-fire in Aleppo, resolution that both Syrian government and opposition forces have been lukewarm about achieving.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations hopes to negotiate a cease-fire around the northern city and restart a process “with a clear political horizon.” But diplomats see little sign of a breakthrough.

headline.main: U.N. to Renew Syria Talks, Seeking Aleppo Cease-Fire
headline.print_headline: U.N. to Renew Syria Talks, Seeking Aleppo Cease-Fire
